pt: {sc}fidelity{/sc} {sc}allegiance{/sc} {sc}fealty{/sc} {sc}loyalty{/sc} {sc}devotion{/sc} {sc}piety{/sc} mean faithfulness to something to which one is bound by pledge or duty. {sc}fidelity{/sc} implies strict and continuing faithfulness to an obligation, trust, or duty.
{sc}allegiance{/sc} suggests an adherence like that of citizens to their country.
{sc}fealty{/sc} implies a fidelity acknowledged by the individual and as compelling as a sworn vow.
{sc}loyalty{/sc} implies a faithfulness that is steadfast in the face of any temptation to renounce, desert, or betray.
{sc}devotion{/sc} stresses zeal and service amounting to self-dedication.
{sc}piety{/sc} stresses fidelity to obligations regarded as natural and fundamental.
